numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Legacy applicants have a higher chance of acceptance.
2. The acceptance rate for legacy applicants stays consistent until about the 50th percentile.
3. I wonder why the estimated legacy boost dips between the 75th percentile and the 90th percentile.
4. I wonder why the estimated legacy boost increases suddenly after the 50th percentile.
5. This issue is relevant to me.
6. This issue is relevant to my community.
7. Soon we will apply to colleges.
8. This issue may impact which schools we consider applying to.
9. We may avoid some schools because we fear rejection.
10. The headline is: Are college admissions considering wealth over grades and work ethic?
